scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder contains several letters and postcards to or from members of the Morgan family in addition to an advertisement for Donald Downie's American Exchange Agency in Paris, France, and two contracts containing several signatures of individuals transferring their stock in the Lexington Gas Company to John Hunt Morgan of Lexington, Kentucky. The majority of the letters and postcards were written by John Hunt Morgan and/or his wife, Virginia Jeffrey Morgan, while they traveled Europe for several months. The couple wrote frequently to John H. Morgan's mother, Carrie Beale Morgan, and brother, Calvin Morgan III, giving updates on their trip and places they had seen as well as sending photographic postcards.
